name: Touhou Danpa
description:
This is a turn-based strategy game in minimalistic style. Choose from 12 touhou girls, clear bullets using distinctive skills.

Control: Mouse click / Touch screen. No keyboard required.

Rules: See "Tutorial" in game.

Achievements: Top-right corner in character selection page.

Note: Game may or may not run smoothly in mobile browser. If you are using android, please download the apk file.
